attributes.action: Refrain from imposing a speed limit of 50 MPH on single carriage (two way) roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although the reasons behind this are understood, the target drivers already ignore current speed limits and this will only hit the majority of law abiding motorists for the actions of the minority.

rejection.details:
A similar petition exists on this already:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/noNSLreduction/

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
